description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，经济学博士。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, holding a Ph.D. in Economics.

nodes.id: 黑龙江省建设投资集团

zh-cn: 黑龙江省建设投资集团

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省的国有投资集团。
description.en: A state-owned investment group located in Heilongjiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在哈尔滨市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Harbin City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Harbin City, Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任哈尔滨市人民政府市长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who previously served as the Mayor of the Harbin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任哈尔滨市人民政府市长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Mayor of the Harbin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个社会主义国家，是中国共产党领导的政权。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, ruled by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的一所大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学。
description.en: A university located in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, China. It is a national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 黑龙江省建设投资集团

description.zh-cn: 张起翔曾任黑龙江省建设投资集团党委书记、董事长。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang previously served as the Party Secretary and Chairman of Heilongjiang Construction Investment Group.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔曾任中共哈尔滨市委副书记。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang previously served as the Deputy Secretary of the Harbin Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔于2022年4月至2024年5月期间担任哈尔滨市人民政府市长。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang served as the Mayor of the Harbin Municipal People's Government from April 2022 to May 2024.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔自2024年5月起出任黑龙江省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang has been serving as the Vice Governor of the Heilongjiang Provincial People's Government since May 2024.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔接替孙喆出任哈尔滨市人民政府市长。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang succeeded Sun Zhe as the Mayor of the Harbin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王合生接替张起翔出任哈尔滨市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wang Hesheng succeeded Zhang Qixiang as the Mayor of the Harbin Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔是东北林业大学的校友。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang is an alumnus of Northeast Forestry University.

description.zh-cn: 张起翔是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zhang Qixiang is a member of the Communist Party of China.
